Articles.Content:
I Think That Procedural Engines Should Be A Thing, I Mean, We Have Procedural Parts And All That Stuff We Even Have Procedural Airships But No Custom Engines, If Someone Were To Make This I Think There Would Be 3 Different Parts, Procedural Jet Engine, Procedural Rocket Engine, And Procedural Nuclear Engine. If You Do Make This Mod, You Don't Have To Credit Me Or Anything Just Make Sure You Don't Discontinue it

 

Alright, That's It.
You might try searching on "Procedural Engines"

I Notice The Link, Thanks For That. But I Was Hoping For Something More Like The Procedural SRB in ProceduralParts If You Have ProceduralParts You Know What I Mean, So If You Find Anything Like That, That Would Be Nice, I Do Also Notice The WIP Thing But You Know I Don't Like To Wait... Hehe,

 

I Know I Could Edit The CFG File For The Procedural SRB But I Don't Know Where The CFG File Is.

If You Could Tell Me The Directory That Would Be Nice

 

That's All

 

Bye
